name: simon-game
description: A memory game in the vein of the classic "Simon" toy. Created as a project for Free Code Camp.

scripts.clean: rm -r dist/ && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/assets dist/assets/js dist/assets/img dist/assets/sounds
scripts.build:js: npm run lint && npm run babel && npm run uglify
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:all: npm run build:js && npm run pug && npm run build:css && npm run build:assets
scripts.watch:all: parallelshell 'npm run serve' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:pug' 'npm run watch:js'

author: Alexander Morse
